amendment.description: Amendment adds reporting requirements on plans of action and milestones for any known information security vulnerability.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 3 printed in House Report 114-136 to require a report to the Committee on Agriculture of the House of Representatives and the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry of the Senate a summary of any plans of action and milestones for any known information security vulnerability.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Takai amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Takai amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Takai.
